com.lhings.library

Annotation Type Payload


  • @Documented
@Retention(value=RUNTIME)
public @interface Payload
    Informs the library about which argument of an Action must be populated with payload before invoking the method that executes the corresponding action. In Lhings any event generated by a device can carry a payload with it. The payload of an event is a string that can contain anything. If the event that sends the payload is linked to an action through a rule, Lhings will forward the payload of the event to that action. Use this annotation to tell the library which parameter must be used to set the payload before invoking the action.
